content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.gfx_apps_pic32mz_da_legato_showcase_round_legato_showcase_round
content.displayName: Legato Dashboard Example for PIC32MZ DA Family w/ Round Display
content.shortDescription: The demo showcases a Smart Home Control User Interface on a stylish, round form factor display with multiple control UI screens for common home appliance and utilities like thermostat, fans and lighting. The demo utilizes the round touch screen display and rotary knob to allow touch and wheel input that complements the round screen and user interface.
content.author: Microchip
